short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to identify and close duplicate tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Duplicate Tab Closer
Effortlessly manage and close duplicate tabs to improve your browsing experience.

What it does: Duplicate Tab Closer is a lightweight and efficient Chrome extension designed to help you automatically detect and close duplicate tabs with ease. The extension lists duplicate tabs in a clean and intuitive popup, allowing you to close individual duplicates or remove them all at once.

Key Features:

Automatic Detection: Instantly find duplicate tabs, whether they’re in the same window or across multiple windows.
Quick Close Buttons: Easily close specific duplicate tabs directly from the popup interface.
One-Click Solution: Remove all duplicate tabs in one click to reduce clutter and free up system resources.
Badge Alerts: Get notified with a badge count when duplicate tabs are detected.
Customizable Look and Feel: Enjoy a clean, user-friendly interface with a responsive design.
Why Install It? If you frequently work with multiple tabs or struggle to keep your browser organized, Duplicate Tab Closer helps you stay productive by eliminating unnecessary clutter. Whether you’re a developer, researcher, or multitasker, this extension optimizes your workflow by reducing the mental load of managing tabs and saving system memory.

Take control of your tabs, increase your browsing efficiency, and enjoy a faster, cleaner browsing experience with Duplicate Tab Closer!
